item.title: DISH
item.description: score:48 Chances: DISH Network Corp. is undergoing a significant change with its acquisition by EchoStar Corp., which could potentially present new investment opportunities. The partnership with BrightLine to introduce interactive ad units on SLING TV could attract more advertisers and drive revenue growth for DISH Media.
